update users
usersname = #{usersname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

modified_Time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=DATE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
